items.text:
In your activity's onCreate() method,
  create an instance of the Fused Location Provider Client as the following code snippet shows.
items.href: Get the last known location  |  Android Developers

items.text:
When your app is
  connected to these you can use the fused location provider's
  getLastLocation()
  method to retrieve the device location.
items.href: Get the last known location  |  Android Developers

items.text:
The following code snippet illustrates the request and a simple handling of the
  response:
items.href: Get the last known location  |  Android Developers

items.text:
The
  getLastLocation()
    method returns a Task
  that you can use to get a
  Location
  object with the latitude and longitude coordinates of a
    geographic location.
items.href: Get the last known location  |  Android Developers
